titles.title: Jimmy Carter National Historical Park Redesignation Act
Jimmy Carter National Historical Park Redesignation Act
A bill to redesignate the Jimmy Carter National Historic Site as the "Jimmy Carter National Historical Park".

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources Subcommittee on National Parks. Hearings held. With printed Hearing: S.Hrg. 116-367.

term.name: Presidents and presidential powers, Vice Presidents

bill.summary:
Jimmy Carter National Historical Park Redesignation Act
This bill redesignates the Jimmy Carter National Historic Site in Georgia as the Jimmy Carter National Historical Park.
